TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The bugs get so bad that they evolve into computer viruses that destroy KSP.

I wish for time travel to happen.

Edited February 2, 2015 by Tery215

Granted. time travel happens every 10 years,you go back in time for a splitsecond. and for every 5 years,you go forward a splitsecond as well.

I wish to grab all the future technlogy.

Granted, but most of the technology is unknown to you. You mess with them and blow yourself up.

I wish for KSP 2.0 before 1.0.

Granted, the developers don't ever release ksp 1.0/Omega

I wish ksp omega will release in the next week.

Edited February 3, 2015 by Spacejuice
Forget wish

Granted. Nothing happens.

I wish I knew the absolutely perfect sandwich recipe.

Granted. You know the perfect recipe for dodo egg sandwich.

I wish for a dodo egg sandwich.

Granted. The eggs give you a nasty prostate condition that kills you.

I wish that I could get at listen more person to give me rep so I can get 2 pips. (Bars, whatever you want call the green thingies under your username.)

Granted, but the bars are red.

I wish for protons!
I wish that I could use a revert function in real life.

Granted, become a Buddhist.

I wish I had four arms.

Granted. They become sentient and kill you.

I wish for bacon.

Granted, but it's frozen and you have to wait for it to thaw first.

I wish that everybody would instantly be fabulous.

Granted. Everyone becomes fabulous like you said. This results in fabulousness not being special because it's so common and the fabulousness standard would increase, such that your wish doesn't change much

I wish for infinite wishes.

Granted. You are infinitely disappointed from all those wishes you made but didn't get.

I wish for a chunk of server.

Granted,you get a chunk of a server chunk,which is McDonald's chunk.

I wish for everyone in the world to high five at the same time

Granted. Now everyone is highfive-ing themselves, including you and me.

I wish for a jar of dank matter.

Granted. You catch a cold from it.

I wish for a burrito staff.

Edited February 6, 2015 by Tery215
changed wish

Granted. You get a staff of cooks from a Mexican restaurant and they make burritos for you. You eat all the burritos and later die from methane intoxication or something like that.

I wish I could go as fast as Sanic.

Granted. Your speed is unchanged, Sanic is slowed down.

I wish my skin would stop being dry.

granted, its as wet as the ocean.

i wish for a kerbal

You are moved to a rocket with a Kerbal.

You "may" be headed straight for a moon with no fuel left.

Did I say rocket? I meant pod on SRB sorry. ...parachutes you say? I don't get it.

I wish for a secure bunker that is wishproof.

Granted. Halfway through the spontaneous generation of the bunker, the wish construction particles bounce off and hit you. You die as a chunk of metal appears in you. (you can't wish to be alive again, either, because of the wishproof material)

I wish for art to be easier.

Granted. All art becomes worthless and so commonplace that art museums fail and billions of dollars are lost.

I wish I had the Sims 2 back...

Granted. It is corrupted and deletes all your files.

I wish for a spacebar.

Granted. It shall be delivered to you at a significant velocity.

I wish for a quadrotor with BB guns mounted.
